courseSectionInformation: Same as ADV 315. Prerequisite: AGCM 220 or ADV 150 or consent of instructor.
description: Theories, principles and practices of applying emerging tools, technology, and norms to communicate agriculture to broad audiences. Focus on the strategies and tactics of using new media to communicate food, fuel, fiber, natural resources, health, human nutrition and related topics. Same as ADV 315. Prerequisite: AGCM 220 or ADV 150 or consent of instructor.
label: Emerging Media
